explanation: The condition used (res + 1) << d <= n was wrong: it computes (res + 1) * 2^d (shifting the whole sum) instead of checking whether adding the value of the current '?' bit (1 << d) to res keeps it <= n. I fixed it to res + (1 << d) <= n so we correctly test whether setting that '?' to '1' (adding 2^d) stays within n.
